summary: The latest webinar from The Block Research brought together DeFi stakeholders from around the world to discuss the latest trends.
title: The Exchange: DeFi Trading from East to West | Full Video
content: In this new webinar, The Block’s Director of Research Larry Cermak was joined by industry executives who explored the DeFi trading trends from East to West.
The panelists discussed the recent DeFi boom and their thoughts on developing trends, including:
Matthew Graham – CEO, Sino Global Capital
Andrew Kang – Managing Partner, Mechanism Capital
Kyle Davies – Co-founder, Three Arrows Capital
Sam Bankman-Fried – CEO, FTX & Alameda Research
You can watch the video in it's entirety below:
